Price: $22.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 14:50:39 UTC – Details)


Amazon Essentials has what you need to outfit your little ones in affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing. Our line of kids’ must-haves includes cozy fleeces and oh-so warm puffer jackets to keep them bundled up when the temperatures drop, as well as school uniform-ready pants and polo shirts. Consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain parent-approved standards in quality and comfort.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.85 x 11.02 x 2.17 inches; 11.99 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ WAE60043FL18
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 28, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amazon Essentials
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09G399R85

Imported
Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
Find your Disney style! Amazon Essentials and Disney pair up to add some wonder to your wardrobe with fresh prints and patterns for your family featuring your favorite characters from Mickey, Marvel to Star Wars and more
Soft, warm, and oh-so-comfortable midweight brushed back fleece
A relaxed straight leg and elastic, drawstring waistband bring lounge-ready style to this classic casual pant

item.title: Hanes Men’s Jogger Sweatpants, EcoSmart Jogger Sweatpants for Men, Men’s Fleece Lounge Pants
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Just-right men’s joggers let you take leisure seriously while staying versatile. Hanes® EcoSmart™ mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms, so you can feel good about your choice. Thick fleece is made with a quality cotton/polyester blend that stays warm and cozy, so jogger pants ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $10.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:57 UTC – Details)


Just-right men’s joggers let you take leisure seriously while staying versatile. Hanes® EcoSmart mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms, so you can feel good about your choice. Thick fleece is made with a quality cotton/polyester blend that stays warm and cozy, so jogger pants can be a longtime favorite. Whether you’re kicking back or warming up for game day, these comfortable sweatpants for men have a relaxed, athletic fit that gets the job done. Side-seam pockets and single back pocket hold essentials, freeing up your hands. Throw these men’s sweatpants in the washer on laundry day for easy care. Use cold water wash to reduce energy use. Love this men’s activewear? Grab one in every color to maximize your style options.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13 x 8 x 1 inches; 12.32 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ O8389
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 18, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hanes
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07HDLM9TC

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
FASHION TO FEEL GOOD ABOUT – Hanes EcoSmart mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms.
SOFT, PLUSH, AND STURDY – Thick fleece men’s activewear stays warm and cozy, so they can be a longtime favorite.
RELAXED SILHOUETTE – For warming up, cooling down, or kicking back, these men’s joggers have a relaxed fit.
